name: MEOWzo
description:
You got nine tries, avoid Nine Traps, and you cannot waste your Nine Lives!

In MEOWzo, You play as Mr. ChungPaws, who has been lured into a testing lab full of spiky traps and fast platforms! The only way out is to run, jump and have precise timing!

Escape the lab without losing your lives, more importanly, NINE of them!
